casebody.data:
Franklin FALIN, Employee
v.
THE ROBERTS COMPANY FIELD SERVICES, INC., Employer, Self-Insured (Key Risk Management Services, Inc., Third-Party Administrator) No. 77P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 William J. Austin, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, For The Roberts Company Field Services, Inc., et al. Kyle R. Still, Attorney at Law, Raleigh. Brian M. Ricci, Attorney at Law, Greenville, For Falin, Franklin.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th of March 2016 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
